channel.title: Go on Dig Sky
channel.description: Recent content in Go on Dig Sky

item.title: Check and Fix tool Go import paths are sorted more strictly than goimports
item.description: Introduction In this article I will share Golang checker tool I created. The tool checks import paths are sorted “strictly”. Here’s the tool repository link. https://github.com/momotaro98/strictimportsort The issue goimports supports -local flag when we have local path. When we have such an import paths. import ( "errors" "github.com/google/wire" "github.com/momotaro98/mixlunch-service-api/partyservice" ) Then run goimports with -local flag $ goimports -local "github.com/momotaro98" . The files are sorted with whilte line like following.
